DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : Examine effectiveness cancer center-based physical activity counsel physical activity rate quality life breast cancer survivor . Hypothesis : Participants intervention group indicate great step count quality life end intervention compare control group
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Cancer Center Based Physical Activity Intervention
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis breast cancer within last 5 year Over age 18 year female Nonambulatory Poor cognitive function Contraindications exercise determine PARQ
